command_group: az iot central device edge module

commands.name: az iot central device edge module list
commands.summary: Get the list of modules in an IoT Edge device.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device edge module list --app-id
                                       --device-id
                                       [--central-api-uri]
                                       [--token]
examples: az iot central device edge module list --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceId}

commands.name: az iot central device edge module restart
commands.summary: Restart a module in an IoT Edge device.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device edge module restart --app-id
                                          --device-id
                                          --module-id
                                          [--central-api-uri]
                                          [--token]
examples: az iot central device edge module restart --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceId} --module-id {moduleId}

commands.name: az iot central device edge module show
commands.summary: Get a module in an IoT Edge device.
commands.syntax:
az iot central device edge module show --app-id
                                       --device-id
                                       --module-id
                                       [--central-api-uri]
                                       [--token]
examples: az iot central device edge module show --app-id {appid} --device-id {deviceId} --module-id {moduleId}
